MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the DG10 postcode area of Moffat. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1:30pm to safely carry out repair work on broken overhead line equipment near to Old Newton and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5PM. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:07 PM on Wednesday, 03 February 2021.
